column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I take showers in the morning , but I enjoy taking a bath in the evening .
#text=I find it relaxes me and helps me to sleep better .
#text=I have a bottle of pink bubble bath that I like to use when I bathe .
#text=I begin by making sure the water will stay in the tub , by flipping up the lever below the faucet .
#text=It prevents the water from going down the drain .
#text=Then I turn on the hot and cold water until it comes out of the faucet at a temperature I like , then make the water a little bit hotter because it usually cools down as the tub is filling .
#text=While the water is running , I add some of my bubble bath directly under the stream of water .
#text=It immediately starts to foam and bubble , and fills the bathroom with a wonderful fragrance .
#text=When the tub is filled almost to the top , I get undressed and get in .
#text=The water rises around me as I sink under the water and I am surrounded by foamy bubbles .
#text=I lean my head back against the edge of the tub and relax in the warm water .
#text=I soak for a while , then take a washcloth and dip it in the water .
#text=I rub the washcloth on a bar of soap and gently scrub my body .
#text=I soak for a while longer until the water starts to get uncomfortably cool .
#text=I flip the lever and the water begins to go down the drain .
#text=I 'm covered with bubbles , so I stand up and turn on the shower to rinse them off .
#text=When I no longer have any soap on me , I get out of the tub and dry off with a fluffy towel .
#text=A warm bath at the end of a long day is very comforting .
